title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the integrands

1 point is earned for the expression for total volume

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y=ln x and y=5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B)=(3.69344, 1.30656)

Volume = ∫ 1 A (lnx) 2 dx+ ∫ A 5 (5−x) 2 dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C51@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 points are earned for the integrands

1 point is earned for the expression for total volume

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y = ln x and y = 5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B) =(3.69344, 1.30656).

Volume = ∫ 1 A (lnx) 2 dx+ ∫ A 5 (5−x) 2 dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C51@

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points are earned for the integrands

1 point is earned for the expression for total volume

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y = ln x and y = 5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B)=(3.69344, 1.30656).

Volume = ∫ 1 A (lnx) 2 dx+ ∫ A 5 (5−x) 2 dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C51@

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for the expression for total volume

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y=ln x and y=5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B)=(3.69344, 1.30656)

1 point is earned for the expression for total volume

ln x = 5-x ⇒ x = 3.69344

Therefore, the graphs of y=ln x and y=5-x intersect in the first quadrant at the point (A, B)=(3.69344, 1.30656)
